sentences.en: He tries to defuse the issue in three ways.
sentences.cn: 他试图用三种途径来化解这一困境.

sentences.en: In conference calls, conflict can be much more difficult to defuse.
sentences.cn: 缓解电话会议上的冲突可能会困难得多.

sentences.en: In Sierra Leone, we helped defuse confrontations and keep peace moving forward.
sentences.cn: 在塞拉利昂, 我们帮助化解了对抗,使和平进程继续向前.

sentences.en: Local police are trying to defuse racial tension in the community.
sentences.cn: 当地的警察竭力缓和这个社区种族间的紧张局面。

sentences.en: Or they can try to adjust the terms to defuse some of the criticisms.
sentences.cn: 或者他们可能设法调整条款以减少一些批评.

sentences.en: Police have defused a bomb found in a downtown building.
sentences.cn: 警察已拆除了在市中心一幢大楼里发现的一枚炸弹的引信。

sentences.en: The organization helped defuse potentially violent situations.
sentences.cn: 该组织帮忙化解了可能出现的暴力局面。

sentences.en: The two groups will meet next week to try to defuse the crisis.
sentences.cn: 这两个小组下周将会面,试图缓和危机.

sentences.en: This may defuse some of the anger.
sentences.cn: 这也许能够消除对方的怒气.

sentences.en: We will strengthen financial supervision and control, and forestall and defuse financial risks.
sentences.cn: 加强和改进金融监管, 防范和化解金融风险.

sentences.en: You will defuse the past and, little by little, you will leave it all behind.
sentences.cn: 你就会化解过去,然后, 你就会渐渐地把过去的一切不愉快抛却在脑后了.

words.tran_cn: 平息；去掉…的雷管；使除去危险性

trans.tran_cn: 拆除引信， 使除去危险性；平息
trans.tran_en: to improve a difficult or dangerous situation, for example by making people less angry or by dealing with the causes of a problem

trans.tran_cn: 拆除（爆炸物）的引信，减少…的危险性，使变为无害，平息，缓和
